site_name: Land comprised within Planning Delivery Zone 4 (Sweetwater), bound to the east by the River Lea, to the north by the Overground railway, and to the west by the River Lee Navigation, Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, London
description: Application for the approval of the PDZ4 Zonal Masterplan pursuant to,conditions LCS0.1 (Zonal Masterplan), LCS0.59 (Zonal Construction Transport Management Plan); LCS0.87 (Zonal Air Quality Assessment); LCS0.137 and LCS0.138 (Green Infrastructure Statement); LCS0.205 (Zonal Car Parking Strategy); LCS0.229 (Zonal Coach Parking Strategy); LCS0.234 and LCS0.235 (Traffic Generation Report); LCS0.237 - (Zonal Delivery and Servicing Strategy) of the Legacy Communities Scheme (LCS) outline planning permission (11/90621/OUTODA, as varied by 14/00036/VAR, 17/00236/VAR and 18/00471/VAR) in so far as they relate to PDZ4.
